name: Hand Printed Cat Card
description:
A sweet, folk art inspired, hand printed card featuring a cute cat with the words 'You're the Cat's Miaow' in folksy style lettering. Each card has a 'Hand Printed' stamp on the reverse.

Ideal for lots of occasions including birthdays, anniversaries and thank you's or just to show your appreciation to someone you love.

Each card measures 12.5cm square and has been individually screen printed by hand using a lovely rich plum coloured ink onto thick, environmentally friendly FSC approved card. An envelope made from brown recycled paper is included, packed together with the card in a biodegradable cellophane bag.

name: Hand Printed 'Nutter' Card
description:
The best selling 'Nutter' design now available on a greetings card - a perfect match for the ever popular 'Nutter' tote bags. Featuring a cheeky squirrel with the words 'Nutter' in folksy style lettering and a 'Hand Printed' stamp on the reverse, it makes the perfect card to send to your 'nutty' friends and family members!

Each card measures 12.5cm square and has been individually screen printed by hand using a lovely chestnut brown ink onto thick, environmentally friendly FSC approved card. An envelope made from brown recycled paper is included, packed together with the card in a biodegradable cellophane bag.

name: Hand Printed Sausage Dog Card
description:
The best selling 'Bow Wow' design now available on a greetings card - a perfect match for the popular matching tote bags. Featuring a cute brown sausage dog with the words 'Bow Wow' above in a speech bubble and a 'Hand Printed' stamp on the reverse it makes a lovely card for any occasion and is perfect for sausage dog fans!

Each card measures 12.5cm square and has been individually screen printed by hand using a lovely chestnut brown ink onto thick, environmentally friendly FSC approved card. An envelope made from brown recycled paper is included, packed together with the card in a biodegradable cellophane bag.

name: Little Owl Lunch Bag
description:
This cute little jute owl lunch bag is ideal for children and grown ups alike! Every bag has been individually hand printed using solvent free inks and comes with a little 'hand printed' tag attached.

Measuring a dinky 21cm (8.3") x 21cm (8.3") square, and 13cm (5.9") deep, it has luxury padded handles and a water resistant, wipe clean inside.

Also great for parties, wedding favors, or just for storing your bits and pieces in the office or home.

name: Sausage Dog Tote Bag
description:
A cute Sausage Dog tote bag made from natural, unbleached cotton/canvas. Every bag has been individually hand printed using solvent free inks and comes with a little 'hand printed' tag attached.

The inspiration for this design came from my grandparent's sausage dog, Simon. During the school holidays we went walking in the lovely Lancashire countryside, Simon could go for miles on those tiny little legs!

The bag is available in two options:

A flat lightweight cotton bag that is easy to fold up and pop in your pocket.

Or a super strong, 12oz heavyweight canvas bag, with an added 10cm depth at the sides for extra capacity.

Both bags are double stitched for extra strength and measure approximately 38cm wide and 43cm tall (not including the handles). Designed to be carried over your shoulder, the handles on both bags measure approximately 30cm from the top of the shoulder to the top of the bag.

Machine washable on a cool, gentle cycle.
